In Discussion there are three types of forums: Open, Closed and Private.
In each type of forum there are three profiles: Public, Member and Admin.
Member users can do anything Public users can.
Admin users can do anything Member or Public users can.
In every forum anyone can delete or edit the forums, topics and replies he creates.

_The rules for the different type of forums are the following:_

*Open forums:*

Anyone can join the forum.
Anyone can view the topics with its replies.
Anyone can add replies in the different topics.
Members can create topics.
Admins can create forums.

*Closed forums:*

To join the forum an admin must invite you
Anyone can view the topics with its replies.
Members can create topics and add replies.
Admins can create forums.

*Private forums:*

To join the forum an admin must invite you
Members can create and view topics and add replies.
Admins can create forums.
